name: msk-mind-plugins
description: MSK MIND Claude Code plugins for Atlassian tools

plugins.name: jira-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for working with Jira - create, update, search, and manage issues using the Jira REST API

plugins.name: confluence-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for working with Confluence - create, update, search, and manage documentation pages using the Confluence REST API
